nodes.text: The Gree Temporary Mind-Link Device existed during the struggle between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. A temporary mind-link device of the Gree, an ancient technologically adept species reputed for their engineers and artisans, the apparatus featured twin beige octahedra, with one vertex of each sharing a gray base.
The Gree Temporary Mind-Link Device appeared in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online role-playing game, Star Wars: The Old Republic, as potential loot and a courting gift for companions.
